landingPage.name: Maciek Iwaniuk.
landingPage.description: I am a high school graduate, with a strong emphasis on enhancing my skills. I aspire to build my future in the IT industry and constantly strive to develop myself to stay up to date with the latest technologies.

zse.title: Secondary Technical School of Electrical Engineering in Bialystok
zse.content: Thanks to the education from this institution, I have gained a basic understanding of computer science, which not only broadened my horizons, but also gave me plenty of knowledge about databases and the development of desktop or web applications.

merinosoft.content: Development of a web application relating to the management of employees in a company.

ebrand.content: Development of a distributed microservices-based system relating to online brand protection. Integration with multiple external APIs.

shopSystem.title: Shop system
shopSystem.content: A project of backend of basic shop.

demoCryptoExchange.title: Demo crypto exchange
demoCryptoExchange.content: A project of a demo cryptocurrency exchange that simulates the real functioning of an exchange, but uses fictional currency. Data regarding cryptocurrency prices is obtained from the API provided by the Binance exchange.

snakeWebApp.title: Snake - web app
snakeWebApp.content: This application handles data sent by the game application written in python. It has extensive user account functionality, along with a comprehensive, feature-rich admin panel.

snakeGame.title: Snake - game
snakeGame.content: This game reads and writes data through a web application API. The user competes against other users through a ranking, whilst earning currency that can then be spent on upgrades or skins that improve the gameplay experience.

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.content: A sapper game with a selectable game difficulty and a save option, which saves choices as well as user records to the local browser memory.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content: A website summarizing information about myself. It includes information about my education, commercial experience and projects, whilst being interactive and animated.

youtubeDownloader.title: YouTube Downloader
youtubeDownloader.content: A desktop application that allows users to download videos from YouTube. It has a tab with download settings, where the user can, among other things, choose the quality of the downloaded content and change the extension.
